betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§bHydrogen§r is an essential resource in any oil refining operation, as it is required for §9hydrocracking§r, §edesulfurization§r, and the production of high quality fuel & lubricant feedstocks and additives. There are a variety of sources of hydrogen, listed below.

- Coal pyrolysis is an excellent source of syngas, which can then be reformed and separated into hydrogen using a PSA.
- Partial oxidation of unutilized oil fractions can also be a good source of syngas for hydrogen.
- Steam reforming fuel gas, natural gas, and methane is another source of syngas.
- Lastly, the catalytic reforming of heavy naphtha also provides hydrogen directly.
